messages.subject: tourette syndrome
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, Sorry for the cross post here. I know many of you are on both lists I m sending this to, but I m hoping someone will be able to direct me. I have a friend
messages.messageBody:
Hi,



Sorry for the cross post here. I know many of you are on both lists I'm
sending this to, but I'm hoping someone will be able to direct me.



I have a friend with a son who has Tourette Syndrome. His son has had to
endure abuse and mistreatment from both students and teachers at school. My
friend is seriously considering taking his son out of school and
homeschooling him. When I spoke with my friend about this, and about
unschooling specifically, he said it was the first thing that sounded
hopeful to him. He asked if there were families who were unschooling with
children with Tourette's. I seem to remember people posting about this. If
you are unschooling, and have a child with Tourette's, would you be willing
to contact me off-list? I'd like to help my friend in any way I can, but I
have no direct experience with this particular set of circumstances.



Thanks in advance!



Kelly



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
